duties_responsibilities.duty: Responsible for preparing test scripts, developing new test cases, executing scripts, and preparing test reports.
Completing all steps of the MSCM, including interpretation of functional requirements and confirming requirements with functional business analysts.
Assisting in unit, integration, performance, and user acceptance testing.
Successfully resolving issues within defined service levels, isolating issues, determining root cause, and outlining effective options to resolve issues.
Interacting with colleagues and business partners to confirm requirements, as well as ensure solution meets needs.
Utilizing applicable tools to facilitate adequate systems testing, monitoring & troubleshooting.
Contributing to identifying and implementing continuous improvement concepts to increase efficiency and maximize value to clients.
Maintaining a broad understanding of current testing software technologies.
Working independently to estimate, design, and deliver solutions.
Maintaining a productive relationship with Stakeholders, Process Owners, Technical and Functional Peers through effective communications and collaboration.
Developing and maintaining a strong practical understanding of technologies currently deployed within the department.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's or Master's degree in IT or related field
